Linux

hexo

npm install hexo-cli -g

npm init myBlog,myBlog

cd myBlog npm install

hexo
hexo-serversudo npm install hexo-server

hexo generate(hexo g)hexo server(hexo s)

http://localhost:4000/

docker

Linuxdocker>>>

apache

docker pull httpd

hexo generate(hexo g)publicdockerpublic( hexo g)

docker run --name apache -v /home/myBlog/public/:/usr/local/apache2/htdocs/ -p 80:80 -d httpd

ip

Post.title: Hexo
Post.content:
hexo

_config.ymlpost_asset_foldertrue

{% asset_img .jpg  %}
<code>npm install hexo-asset-image --save</code>

bug

/node_modules/hexo-asset-image/index.js

'use strict';
var cheerio = require('cheerio');
// http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14480345/how-to-get-the-nth-occurrence-in-a-string
function getPosition(str, m, i) {
  return str.split(m, i).join(m).length;
}
var version = String(hexo.version).split('.');
hexo.extend.filter.register('after_post_render', function(data){
  var config = hexo.config;
  if(config.post_asset_folder){
        var link = data.permalink;
    if(version.length > 0 && Number(version[0]) == 3)
       var beginPos = getPosition(link, '/', 1) + 1;
    else
       var beginPos = getPosition(link, '/', 3) + 1;
    // In hexo 3.1.1, the permalink of "about" page is like ".../about/index.html".
    var endPos = link.lastIndexOf('/') + 1;
    link = link.substring(beginPos, endPos);
    var toprocess = ['excerpt', 'more', 'content'];
    for(var i = 0; i < toprocess.length; i++){
      var key = toprocess[i];
      var $ = cheerio.load(data[key], {
        ignoreWhitespace: false,
        xmlMode: false,
        lowerCaseTags: false,
        decodeEntities: false
      });
      $('img').each(function(){
        if ($(this).attr('src')){
            // For windows style path, we replace '\' to '/'.
            var src = $(this).attr('src').replace('\\', '/');
            if(!/http[s]*.*|\/\/.*/.test(src) &&
               !/^\s*\//.test(src)) {
              // For "about" page, the first part of "src" can't be removed.
              // In addition, to support multi-level local directory.
              var linkArray = link.split('/').filter(function(elem){
                return elem != '';
              });
              var srcArray = src.split('/').filter(function(elem){
                return elem != '' && elem != '.';
              });
              if(srcArray.length > 1)
                srcArray.shift();
              src = srcArray.join('/');
              $(this).attr('src', config.root + link + src);
              console.info&&console.info("update link as:-->"+config.root + link + src);
            }
        }else{
            console.info&&console.info("no src attr, skipped...");
            console.info&&console.info($(this));
        }
      });
      data[key] = $.html();
    }
  }
});

hexo g

Hexo
hexo

/node_modules/hexo-asset-image/index.js

'use strict';
var cheerio = require('cheerio');
// http://stackoverflow.com/questions/14480345/how-to-get-the-nth-occurrence-in-a-string
function getPosition(str, m, i) {
  return str.split(m, i).join(m).length;
}
var version = String(hexo.version).split('.');
hexo.extend.filter.register('after_post_render', function(data){
  var config = hexo.config;
  if(config.post_asset_folder){
        var link = data.permalink;
    if(version.length > 0 && Number(version[0]) == 3)
       var beginPos = getPosition(link, '/', 1) + 1;
    else
       var beginPos = getPosition(link, '/', 3) + 1;
    // In hexo 3.1.1, the permalink of "about" page is like ".../about/index.html".
    var endPos = link.lastIndexOf('/') + 1;
    link = link.substring(beginPos, endPos);
    var toprocess = ['excerpt', 'more', 'content'];
    for(var i = 0; i < toprocess.length; i++){
      var key = toprocess[i];
      var $ = cheerio.load(data[key], {
        ignoreWhitespace: false,
        xmlMode: false,
        lowerCaseTags: false,
        decodeEntities: false
      });
      $('img').each(function(){
        if ($(this).attr('src')){
            // For windows style path, we replace '\' to '/'.
            var src = $(this).attr('src').replace('\\', '/');
            if(!/http[s]*.*|\/\/.*/.test(src) &&
               !/^\s*\//.test(src)) {
              // For "about" page, the first part of "src" can't be removed.
              // In addition, to support multi-level local directory.
              var linkArray = link.split('/').filter(function(elem){
                return elem != '';
              });
              var srcArray = src.split('/').filter(function(elem){
                return elem != '' && elem != '.';
              });
              if(srcArray.length > 1)
                srcArray.shift();
              src = srcArray.join('/');
              $(this).attr('src', config.root + link + src);
              console.info&&console.info("update link as:-->"+config.root + link + src);
            }
        }else{
            console.info&&console.info("no src attr, skipped...");
            console.info&&console.info($(this));
        }
      });
      data[key] = $.html();
    }
  }
});

hexo g

Hexo
hexo

Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
Post.raw:
---
title: Hello World
categories: 
  - Hexo
tags:
  - Hexo
  - others
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: FTPSFTPSCP
Post._content:
# 
## FTP
>TCP/IPFTPTCP/IPINTERNETFTPHTTPFTPFTPTCPFTPFTPTCPiptables21 + PASVTCP 

>FTP
>>PORTFTP21PORT1024+201024+
>>PASVPassiveFTP21PASV1024+
PORTinternetPASV21PASV
## SFTP
>SFTP FTPSFTPSSHSSHSFTP(Secure File Transfer Protocol)SFTPsshd22SFTPSFTPSFTP/FTPSFTPFTP

      
	sftp user@host  
	l:  
	lcdlpwd  
	  
	put filename.txt [some/directory]  
	  
	mput *.* // multiple  
	:  
	get filename.file [some/directory]  
	  
	mget *.* [some/directory]  
	  
	bye/exit/quit

## SCP
>SCPSecure copysshssh

	  
	scp filename.txt user@host:some/directory  
	  
	scp -P 2234 filename.txt user@host:some/directory  
	home  
	scp filename1.txt filename2.txt user@host:~  
	  
	scp user@host:directory/filename.txt  /directory  
	  
	scp -r user@host:directory/folder  .  
	  
	scp user@host1:directory/filename.txt  user@host1:directory
# 
>[FTPSFTPSCP](https://www.cnblogs.com/xingxia/p/system_ftp.html)

Post.title: Flex
Post._content: ## Flex ###### Flex Flexible Box "" Flex .box{ display: flex; } Flex .box{ display:inline-flex } Webkit-webkit .box{ display:-webkit-flex;/* Safari */ display:flex; } !Flexfloatclearvertical-align ## Flex Flex flex container"" Flex flex item"" ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025659bg2015071004.png) >main axiscross axis >>main startmain end >>cross startcross end >main sizecross size ## >6 > > + flex-direction > + flex-wrap > + flex-flow > + justify-content > + align-items > + align-content #### 3.1 flex-direction flex-direction .box { flex-direction: row | row-reverse | column | column-reverse; } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025707bg2015071005.png) >4 > > + row > + row-reverse > + column > + column-reverse ### 3.2 flex-wrap ()flex-wrap ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025807bg2015071006.png) .box{ flex-wrap: nowrap | wrap | wrap-reverse; } > > > + nowrap > ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025812bg2015071007.png) > + wrap > ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025819bg2015071008.jpg) > + wrap-reverse > ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025823bg2015071009.jpg) ### 3.3 flex-flow flex-flowflex-directionflex-wraprow nowrap .box { flex-flow: || ; } ### 3.4 justify-content justify-content .box { justify-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around; } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025828bg2015071010%20(1).png) >5 > > + flex-start > + flex-end > + center > + space-between > + space-around ### 3.5 align-items align-items .box { align-items: flex-start | flex-end | center | baseline | stretch; } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025833bg2015071011.png) >5 > > + flex-start > + flex-end > + center > + baseline: > + stretchauto ### 3.6 align-content align-content .box { align-content: flex-start | flex-end | center | space-between | space-around | stretch; } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025837bg2015071012.png) >6 > > + lex-start > + flex-end > + center > + space-between > + space-around > + stretch ## >6 > > + order > + flex-grow > + flex-shrink > + flex-basis > + flex > + align-self ### 4.1 order order0 .item { order: ; } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025840bg2015071013.png) ### 4.2 flex-grow flex-grow0 .item { flex-grow: ; /* default 0 */ } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025844bg2015071014.png) flex-grow1flex-grow21 ### 4.3 flex-shrink flex-shrink1 .item { flex-shrink: ; /* default 1 */ } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025848bg2015071015.jpg) flex-shrink1flex-shrink01 ### 4.4 flex-basis flex-basismain sizeauto .item { flex-basis: | auto; /* default auto */ } widthheight350px ### 4.5 flex flexflex-grow, flex-shrink flex-basis0 1 auto .item { flex: none | [ <'flex-grow'> <'flex-shrink'>? || <'flex-basis'> ] } auto (1 1 auto) none (0 0 auto) ### 4.6 align-self align-selfalign-itemsautoalign-itemsstretch .item { align-self: auto | flex-start | flex-end | center | baseline | stretch; } ![](https://images.cnblogs.com/cnblogs_com/adongyo/1643144/o_200207025852bg2015071016.png) 6autoalign-items ## > [Flex](http://caibaojian.com/flexbox-basic-tourial.html) > > [Flex ](http://www.ruanyifeng.com/blog/2015/07/flex-grammar.html)

  3. OpenGLGLUT
    (-0.8, -0.8)(0.8, -0.8)(200, 200)

    #include <GL/glut.h>
void Paint() // 
{ 
    glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT); // 
    glRectf(-0.8,-0.8,0.8,0.8); //  
    glFlush(); 
}
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{ 
    glutInit(&argc, argv); // GLUT, main()
    glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_SINGLE | GLUT_RGBA);// (, RGBA, )
    glutInitWindowSize(200, 200); // 
    glutCreateWindow(""); // 
    glutDisplayFunc(Paint); // , 
    glutMainLoop(); // OpenGL
}

  4. OpenGLGLUT
    (-0.5, 0)(0.5, 0)(200, 200)

    #include <GL/glut.h>

void Paint() // 
{ 
    glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT); // 
    glColor3f(1,0,0);//  
    glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES); //   
    { 
        glVertex2f(-0.5, 0); // 
        glVertex2f(0.5, 0);
        glVertex2f(0, 0.9); 
    }
    glEnd(); // 
    glFlush(); // OpenGL
}
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{ 
    glutInit(&argc, argv); // GLUT, main()
    glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_SINGLE | GLUT_RGBA);// (, RGBA, )
    glutInitWindowPosition(100, 100); // 
    glutInitWindowSize(200, 200); // 
    glutCreateWindow(""); // 
    glutDisplayFunc(Paint); // , 
    glutMainLoop(); // OpenGL
}

  5. OpenGLGLUT
    4(-0.8, -0.8)(0.5, -0.8)(0.8, 0.8)(-0.5,0.8)(200, 200)

    #include <GL/glut.h>
void Paint() // 
{ 
    glClearColor(1, 1, 1, 1);// 
    glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT); // 
    glColor3f(0,0,1);//  
    glBegin(GL_QUADS);// 
    {    
        glVertex2f(-0.8,-0.8);//
        glVertex2f(0.5,-0.8);
        glVertex2f(0.8,0.8);
        glVertex2f(-0.5,0.8);
    }
    glEnd(); 
    glFlush(); // OpenGL
}
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{ 
    glutInit(&argc, argv); // GLUT, main()
    glutInitDisplayMode(GLUT_SINGLE | GLUT_RGBA);// (, RGBA, )
    glutInitWindowPosition(100, 100); // 
    glutInitWindowSize(200, 200); // 
    glutCreateWindow(""); // 
    glutDisplayFunc(Paint); // , 
    glutMainLoop(); // OpenGL
}

  6. OpenGLGLUT(-0.6, -0.6)(0.6, 0.6)510.5(200, 200)

    #include <GL/glut.h>
void Paint()
{
    double x;
    glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
    glBegin(GL_POINTS); 
    for(x = -0.6;x<=0.6;x+=0.3)
        glVertex2f(x,x);
    glEnd();
    glFlush();
}
int main(int argc,char *argv[])
{
    glutInit(&argc, argv); 
    glutInitWindowSize(200,200);
    glutCreateWindow("");
    glutDisplayFunc(Paint);
    glPointSize(10.5);
    glEnable(GL_POINT_SMOOTH);
    glutMainLoop();
}

  7. OpenGLGLUT
    (-0.6, -0.3)(0.6, 0.3)4.5(200, 200)

    #include <GL/glut.h>
void Paint()
{
    double x;
    glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
    glBegin(GL_LINE_STRIP); 
    {
        glVertex2f(-0.6,-0.3);
        glVertex2f(0.6,0.3);
    }
    glEnd();
    glFlush();
}
int main(int argc,char *argv[])
{
    glutInit(&argc, argv); 
    glutInitWindowSize(200,200);
    glutCreateWindow("");
    glutDisplayFunc(Paint);
    glLineWidth(4.5);
    glEnable(GL_LINE_STIPPLE);
    glutMainLoop();
}

  8. OpenGLGLUGLUT
    1/2
    (-0.8, -0.8)(0.8, 0.8)
    1/20.6
    (400, 200)

    #include <gl/glut.h>
Viewport(int x, int y, int w, int h)
{ 
    glViewport(x, y, w, h); // 
    glLoadIdentity(); // , 
}
void Paint()
{ 
    int w = glutGet(GLUT_WINDOW_WIDTH)/2 ;   // 
    int h = glutGet(GLUT_WINDOW_HEIGHT);   // 
    glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT); // 
    Viewport(0, 0, w, h); // 
    glColor3f(1, 0, 0); // ,
    glRectf(-0.8, -0.8, 0.8, 0.8); // 
    Viewport(w, 0, w, h); // 
    glColor3f(0, 0, 1); // , 
    glutSolidTeapot(0.6); // 
    glFlush(); // OpenGL
}
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{ 
    glutInit(&argc, argv); // GLUT, main()
    glutInitWindowSize(400,200);
    glutCreateWindow(""); // 
    glutDisplayFunc(Paint); // 
    glutMainLoop(); // 
}

  9. OpenGLGLUGLUT
    1/4(-0.8,-0.8)(0.8, 0.8)
    1/4
    0.6
    1/4
    (-0.8, -0.8)(0.8, -0.8)(0, 0.8) (200,200)

    #include <gl/glut.h>
Viewport(int x, int y, int w, int h)
{ 
    glViewport(x, y, w, h); // 
    glLoadIdentity(); // , 
}
void Paint()
{ 
    int w = glutGet(GLUT_WINDOW_WIDTH) / 2; // 
    int h = glutGet(GLUT_WINDOW_HEIGHT) / 2; // 
    glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT); // 
    Viewport(0, 0, w, h); // 
    glColor3f(1, 0, 0); // ,
    glRectf(-0.8, -0.8, 0.8, 0.8); // 
    Viewport(w, 0, w, h); // 
    glColor3f(0, 1, 0); // , 
    glutSolidTeapot(0.6); // 
    Viewport(w/2, h, w, h); // 
    glColor3f(0, 0, 1); // , 
    glBegin(GL_TRIANGLES); //  
    {
        glVertex2f(-0.8, -0.8); // 
        glVertex2f(0.8, -0.8);
        glVertex2f(0, 0.8); 
    }
    glEnd();
    glFlush(); // OpenGL
}
int main(int argc, char *argv[])
{ 
    glutInit(&argc, argv); // GLUT, main()
    glutInitWindowSize(200,200);
    glutCreateWindow(""); // 
    glutDisplayFunc(Paint); // 
    glutMainLoop(); // 
}
